title: SBC Yahoo! Online Ad Script Font ID?
content:
I always think of the venerable Marydale when trying to ID handwriting scripts. Alas, it doesn't match the font in question.   
   
 [http://www.typequarry.com/type.html?sku=016&cart=10868267713781270](http://web.archive.org/web/20050819063831/http:/www.typequarry.com/type.html?sku=016&cart=10868267713781270)
author: marcox

comments.content: nola, this forum doesn't like bmp formats. Repost it as a Gif or Jpg
I think I might have found it! I think it might be Ardleys Hand. I'm looking for a link. I think it is a WSI font (?)

Here's some [INFO](http://web.archive.org/web/20050819063831/http:/bowfinprintworks.com/ListPages/HWFontAliases.html) about the WSI handwriting fonts.   
  
 [HERE](http://web.archive.org/web/20050819063831/http:/fonts.ontheweb.com/fonts/ardleys-hand__1.html) is the only place I could find a link where you can buy it

I found an ambiguious link where this could be downloaded.   
   
Edit: on a second look, that site doesn't seem um ... kosher.

No font goddess here.......just a lucky amateur.   
Glad I could help, Nola!
